reviewText: I use scenic types of DVD's to walk on the Tread mill while listing to music. The distractions help... The scenery was beautiful on this video. It felt like you were walking right along in downtown NYC. The music on this video was pretty good. I do wish that they would have captions that tell you what you are looking at. Ex: name of building, bridge, site... Like on the "Over" Dvd's. Very nicely done.
